branding.tagline: Discover the extraordinary in the ordinary

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Urban fantasy featuring unusual occupations and settings
publishing_focus.target_audience: Readers intrigued by the supernatural hidden within everyday life
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: We specialize in stories set in unusual occupations or settings, offering a fresh perspective in urban fantasy
publishing_focus.example_titles: Comparable to works by Charlaine Harris or Benedict Jacka
